verses.verse: Peter <WG4074>, an apostle <WG652> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, to the elect who are sojourners <WG3927> of the Dispersion in <WG1290> Pontus <WG4195>, Galatia <WG1053>, Cappadocia <WG2587>, Asia <WG773>, and <WG2532> Bithynia <WG1588>,

according to <WG2596> the foreknowledge <WG4268> of God <WG2316> the Father <WG3962>, in <WG1722> sanctification <WG38> of the Spirit <WG4151>, unto <WG1519> obedience <WG5218> and <WG2532> sprinkling <WG4473> of the blood <WG129> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>: Grace <WG5485> to you <WG5213> and <WG2532> peace <WG1515> be multiplied <WG4129>.

Blessed <WG2128> be the God <WG2316> and <WG2532> Father <WG3962> of <WG2962> our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, who <WG3588> according to <WG2596> his <WG846> great <WG4183> mercy <WG1656> begat <WG313> us <WG2248> again <WG313> unto <WG1519> a living <WG2198> hope <WG1680> by <WG1223> the resurrection <WG386> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>,

unto <WG1519> an inheritance <WG2817> incorruptible <WG862>, and <WG2532> undefiled <WG283>, and <WG2532> that fadeth not away <WG263>, reserved <WG5083> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772> for <WG1519> you <WG5209>,

who <WG3588> by <WG1722> the power <WG1411> of God <WG2316> are guarded <WG5432> through <WG1223> faith <WG4102> unto <WG1519> a salvation <WG4991> ready <WG2092> to be revealed <WG601> in <WG1722> the last <WG2078> time <WG2540>.

Wherein <WG1722> ye greatly rejoice <WG21>, though now <WG737> for a little while <WG3641>, if <WG1487> need be <WG1163>, ye have been <WG2076> put to grief <WG3076> in <WG1722> manifold <WG4164> trials <WG3986>,

that <WG2443> the proof <WG1383> of your <WG5216> faith <WG4102>, being more <WG4183> precious <WG5093> than gold <WG5553> that <WG3588> perisheth <WG622> though <WG1161> it is proved <WG1381> by <WG1223> fire <WG4442>, may be found <WG2147> unto <WG1519> praise <WG1868> and <WG2532> glory <WG1391> and <WG2532> honor <WG5092> at <WG1722> the revelation <WG602> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>:

whom <WG3739> not <WG3756> having <WG1492> seen <WG1492> ye love <WG25>; on <WG1519> whom <WG3739>, though now <WG737> ye see <WG3708> him not <WG3361>, yet <WG1161> believing <WG4100>, ye rejoice <WG21> greatly with joy <WG5479> unspeakable <WG412> and <WG2532> full of glory <WG1392>:
receiving <WG2865> the end <WG5056> of your <WG5216> faith <WG4102>, even the salvation <WG4991> of <WG5590> your souls <WG5590>.

Concerning <WG4012> which <WG3739> salvation <WG4991> the prophets <WG4396> sought <WG1567> and <WG2532> searched diligently <WG1830>, who prophesied <WG4395> of <WG4012> the grace <WG5485> that should come unto <WG1519> you <WG5209>:

searching2045, 1519 what <WG5101> time or <WG2228> what manner of <WG4169> time <WG2540> the Spirit <WG4151> of Christ <WG5547> which <WG3588> was in <WG1722> them <WG846> did point <WG1213> unto <WG4303>, when it testified beforehand the sufferings <WG3804> of <WG1519> Christ <WG5547>, and <WG2532> the glories <WG1391> that <WG5023> should follow them <WG3326>.

To whom <WG3739> it was revealed <WG601>, that <WG3754> not <WG3756> unto themselves <WG1438>, but <WG1161> unto you <WG2254>, did they minister <WG1247> these things <WG846>, which <WG3739> now <WG3568> have been <WG312> announced <WG312> unto you <WG5213> through <WG1223> them <WG3588> that preached the gospel <WG2097> unto you <WG5209> by <WG1722> the Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> sent forth <WG649> from <WG575> heaven <WG3772>; which things <WG3739> angels <WG32> desire <WG1937> to look <WG3879> into <WG1519>.

Wherefore <WG1352> girding up <WG328> the loins <WG3751> of your <WG5216> mind <WG1271>, be sober <WG3525> and set your hope <WG1679> perfectly <WG5049> on <WG1909> the grace <WG5485> that is to be brought <WG5342> unto you <WG5213> at <WG1722> the revelation <WG602> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>;

as <WG5613> children <WG5043> of obedience <WG5218>, not <WG3361> fashioning yourselves according to <WG4964> your former <WG4386> lusts <WG1939> in <WG1722> the time of your <WG5216> ignorance <WG52>:
but <WG235> like <WG2532> as <WG2596> he who called <WG2564> you <WG5209> is holy <WG40>, be <WG1096> ye <WG846> yourselves also holy <WG40> in <WG1722> all <WG3956> manner of living <WG391>;
because <WG1360> it is written <WG1125>, Ye <WG1096> shall be holy <WG40>; for <WG3754> I <WG1473> am <WG1510> holy <WG40>.

And <WG2532> if <WG1487> ye call on <WG1941> him as Father <WG3962>, who <WG3588> without respect of persons <WG678> judgeth <WG2919> according to <WG2596> each man <WG1538>'s work <WG2041>, pass <WG390> the time <WG5550> of your <WG5216> sojourning <WG3940> in <WG1722> fear <WG5401>:

knowing <WG1492> that <WG3754> ye were <WG3084> redeemed <WG3084>, not <WG3756> with corruptible things <WG5349>, with silver <WG694> or <WG2228> gold <WG5553>, from <WG1537> your <WG5216> vain <WG3152> manner of life <WG391> handed down from your fathers <WG3970>;
but <WG235> with precious <WG5093> blood <WG5613>, as of a lamb <WG286> without spot <WG784>, <WG299> even <WG2532> the blood <WG129> of Christ <WG5547>:

who was foreknown <WG4267> indeed <WG3303> before <WG4253> the foundation <WG2602> of the world <WG2889>, but <WG1161> was manifested <WG5319> at <WG1909> the end <WG2078> of times <WG5550> for <WG1223> your sake <WG5209>,

who <WG3588> through <WG1223> him <WG846> are believers <WG4100> in <WG1519> God <WG2316>, that <WG3588> raised <WG1453> him846, 1453 from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>, and <WG2532> gave <WG1325> him <WG846> glory <WG1391>; so that <WG5620> your <WG5216> faith <WG4102> and <WG2532> hope <WG1680> might be <WG1511> in <WG1519> God <WG2316>.

Seeing ye have purified <WG48> your <WG5216> souls <WG5590> in <WG1722> your obedience <WG5218> to the truth <WG225> unto <WG1519> unfeigned <WG505> love of the brethren <WG5360>, love <WG25> one another <WG240> from <WG1537> the <WG2513> heart <WG2588> fervently <WG1619>:

having been begotten again <WG313>, not <WG3756> of <WG1537> corruptible <WG5349> seed <WG4701>, but <WG235> of incorruptible <WG862>, through <WG1223> the word <WG3056> of God <WG2316>, which liveth <WG2198> and <WG2532> abideth <WG3306>.

For <WG1360>, All <WG3956> flesh <WG4561> is as <WG5613> grass <WG5528>, And <WG2532> all <WG3956> the glory <WG1391> thereof <WG444> as <WG5613> the flower <WG438> of grass <WG5528>. The grass <WG5528> withereth <WG3583>, and <WG2532> the <WG846> flower <WG438> falleth <WG1601>:

But <WG1161> the word <WG4487> of the Lord <WG2962> abideth <WG3306> for <WG1519> ever <WG165>. And <WG1161> this <WG5124> is <WG2076> the word <WG4487> of good tidings which <WG3588> was preached <WG2097> unto <WG1519> you <WG5209>.
